sentence: ?The problem with Democracy you can look at quotes from famous Chinese leaders like Mao, Gorbachev they loved Democracy because Democracy is a step toward socialism, which is a step towards communism.? We will cross our fingers and hope that Loren Culp does not somehow emerge from the crowded GOP Primary to unseat Dan Newhouse as the nominee, because Washington's 4th Congressional District has a +13 Republican lean, and whomever comes out of it is almost guaranteed a win, regrettably.
title: Fanatical Republican Extremist of the Day: Loren Culp
